subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The No. 1-seeded Blue Devils, who are in the final for the first time since 2010, will be trying to secure a fifth national title for Coach Mike Krzyzewski.
snippet: The No. 1-seeded Blue Devils, who are in the final for the first time since 2010, will be trying to secure a fifth national title for Coach Mike Krzyzewski.
